settings.text:
To return your dress, a Return Authorization is required. Returns must be requested within 1-week of receiving the order. We charge a 20% restocking fee for returned dresses or you can choose a store credit with no restocking fee and an additional $10 bonus credit. Please bear in mind that we do not profit from the restocking fee and it is solely to ensure our low prices.


To get started, click on the link below.


CLICK HERE TO START YOUR RETURN PROCESS



If you are purchasing more than 1 piece, our customer experience team will be contacting you to confirm a restocking fee before shipping out your order. Because the order has multiple pieces, the restocking fee will vary from the original 20%.

While most orders will fall under the default 20% restocking fee, there are some orders that may be subject to a higher restocking fee than normal due to the dress being a special order. In either case, our customer experience team will reach out to you to confirm with you.

settings.heading: INSTRUCTIONS
settings.row_content:
Your dress was not as expected? We'll do anything to make it right within reason. Just follow these steps and you are good to go:

  1. Click the NEW returns portal link above to be taken to a new page powered by Re:Do. From there, enter your order number, fill out the info and start the return.
  2. Carefully place the item back on the hanger, in the bag, and back in the box.
  3. Seal the box as best you can.
  4. Ship it back to us with the label from Re:Do
  5. All international customers are responsible to pay any and all fees when shipping an item back. (Duties, taxes, customs etc.)
  6. Once your item has been received, inspected and processed, we will issue the requested store credit or refund.

settings.heading: RETURN RULES
settings.row_content:
Before starting your return, please read the rules!

  1. Please feel free to contact us with any questions.
  2. You must request a return within 1-week of receiving your order, No exchanges. If you need another style or size of dress, initiate a return and purchase the other dress to receive it quickly.
  3. Final Sale items can not be returned!
  4. Store Credit is available with no restocking fee and a $10 bonus.
  5. Returns are carefully inspected; all original tags must be in place and the product must not show any signs of wear or damage.
  6. If you receive a damaged item, tell us right away! That way, we can immediately send your replacement of the same style, size and color.

settings.caption: How to return or exchange your dress?
